feed.title: North Mountain (Cape Breton) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: LES SUÊTES WIND WARNING, North Mountain (Cape Breton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:24 p.m. ADT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Mountain 3:00 AM ADT Tuesday 2 May 2023
Temperature: -0.4°C
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -1.6°C
Wind: ESE 33 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Monday night: Showers. Low plus 3 except zero over the Highlands.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers beginning this evening. Risk of freezing rain over the Highlands overnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 110 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence. Low plus 3 except zero over the Highlands. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High 6 except plus 2 over the Highlands.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of freezing rain over the Highlands early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 110 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence in the morning. Wind becoming east 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 6 except plus 2 over the Highlands. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain changing to periods of light snow or ice pellets overnight. Risk of freezing rain over the Highlands in the evening and after midnight. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 1 May 2023
